titles.title: FAUCI Act
FAUCI Act
Fixing Administrations Unethical Corrupt Influence Act

A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit former employees of covered health agencies from serving on the board of entities involved in development and research of a drug, biological product, or device and from profiting from a drug, biological product, or device, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
